        public static void updateAppointment​(int appointmentId,
                                     java.lang.String appointmentTitle,
                                     java.lang.String appointmentDescription,
                                     java.lang.String appointmentLocation,

                                     java.time.LocalDateTime appointmentStart,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime appointmentEnd,
                                     int appointmentCustomerId,
                                     int appointmentUserId,
                                     int appointmentContact)
        SQL query to update the selected modified appointment in the database
        Parameters:
        appointmentId - appointment ID
        appointmentTitle - appointment title
        appointmentDescription - appointment description
        appointmentContact - appointment contact
        appointmentType - appointment type
        appointmentStart - appointment start date/time
        appointmentEnd - appointment end date/time
        appointmentCustomerId - associated appointment customer ID
        appointmentUserId - associated appointment user ID
        appointmentLocation - appointment location

      • addAppointment

        public static void addAppointment​(java.lang.String appointmentTitle,
                                  java.lang.String appointmentDescription,
                                  java.lang.String appointmentLocation,
                                  java.lang.String appointmentType,
                                  java.time.LocalDateTime appointmentStart,
                                  java.time.LocalDateTime appointmentEnd,
                                  int appointmentCustomerId,
                                  int appointmentUserId,
                                  int appointmentContact)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        SQL query to add new appointment into the database. Database auto-increments appointment ID.
        Parameters:
        appointmentTitle - appointment title
        appointmentDescription - appointment description
        appointmentLocation - appointment location
        appointmentType - appointment Type
        appointmentStart - appointment Start date/time
        appointmentEnd - appointment End date/time
        appointmentCustomerId - associated appointment customer ID
        appointmentUserId - associated appointment user ID
        appointmentContact - associated appointment contact ID
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - addresses unhandled SQL exception
